about_the_game:
The stealthy Tachibana Lima is a well-rounded ship that can fend for herself in a gunnery duel and does not hesitate to punch above her weight using her effective torpedoes.

Key features:

  • Low detectability

  • Rapid torpedo tube reload.

This package includes:

  • Tachibana Lima, Japanese Tier II destroyer

  • Port slot

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will not receive any compensation for her.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.
detailed_description:
The stealthy Tachibana Lima is a well-rounded ship that can fend for herself in a gunnery duel and does not hesitate to punch above her weight using her effective torpedoes.

Key features:

  • Low detectability

  • Rapid torpedo tube reload.

This package includes:

  • Tachibana Lima, Japanese Tier II destroyer

  • Port slot

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will not receive any compensation for her.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.

  • OS: macOS 10.7.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570R
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000, Intel Iris 5100
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 43 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080
